languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько минут Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "Мне пора. У тебя предостаточно дел и без моих расспросов". {n}Он невесело усмехается, отступает и подносит вашу руку к губам.{/n} "Я надеюсь, мы еще найдем время побыть вдвоем. Наедине".

traits.locale_text: {n}Спустя несколько минут Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "Мне пора. У тебя предостаточно дел и без моих расспросов". {n}Он невесело усмехается, отступает и подносит вашу руку к губам.{/n} "Я надеюсь, мы еще найдем время побыть вдвоем. Наедине".

languages.text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько минут Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "Мне пора. У тебя предостаточно дел и без моих расспросов". {n}Он невесело усмехается, отступает и подносит вашу руку к губам.{/n} "Я надеюсь, мы еще найдем время побыть вдвоем. Наедине".

traits.locale_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

{n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

{n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

{n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

languages.text: {n}过了几分钟，海因里希叹了口气。{/n}“我得走了。你还有堆积如山的事情要忙，别把时间浪费在我的问题上了。”{n}他笑了起来，但笑声中却毫无笑意。他向后退了一步，将你的手放在他的唇边。{/n}“但即便如此，我依然希望能与你共度一段时光，只有你我二人。”
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}过了几分钟，海因里希叹了口气。{/n}“我得走了。你还有堆积如山的事情要忙，别把时间浪费在我的问题上了。”{n}他笑了起来，但笑声中却毫无笑意。他向后退了一步，将你的手放在他的唇边。{/n}“但即便如此，我依然希望能与你共度一段时光，只有你我二人。”

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de unos minutos, Heinrix suspira.{/n} «Debo irme. Tiene un montón de cosas que hacer, entre las que no se encuentra responder a mis preguntas». {n}Se ríe con desgana, se aleja un paso y lleva tu mano a sus labios.{/n} «Sin embargo, espero que tengamos ocasión de pasar un rato juntos. A solas».
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de unos minutos, Heinrix suspira.{/n} «Debo irme. Tiene un montón de cosas que hacer, entre las que no se encuentra responder a mis preguntas». {n}Se ríe con desgana, se aleja un paso y lleva tu mano a sus labios.{/n} «Sin embargo, espero que tengamos ocasión de pasar un rato juntos. A solas».

languages.text: {n}数分後、ハインリックスはため息を付いた。{/n}「もう行かなければ。あなたにはやるべきことが山積しているはずだ。俺の疑問に応えるのはその中にはない」{n}彼はユーモアを交えることなく笑い、後退り、あなたの手を唇に近づけた。{/n}「それでも、共に過ごす時間があることを願っている。2人きりで」
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}数分後、ハインリックスはため息を付いた。{/n}「もう行かなければ。あなたにはやるべきことが山積しているはずだ。俺の疑問に応えるのはその中にはない」{n}彼はユーモアを交えることなく笑い、後退り、あなたの手を唇に近づけた。{/n}「それでも、共に過ごす時間があることを願っている。2人きりで」

languages.text: {n}Quelques minutes passent. Enfin, Heinrix soupire.{/n} « Je vais vous laisser. Vous avez une montagne de choses à faire, et répondre à mes questions n'en fait pas partie. » {n}Il laisse échapper un rire dépité, puis recule et porte votre main à ses lèvres.{/n} « J'espère quand même que nous aurons bientôt l'occasion de passer du temps ensemble. En tête à tête. »
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelques minutes passent. Enfin, Heinrix soupire.{/n} « Je vais vous laisser. Vous avez une montagne de choses à faire, et répondre à mes questions n'en fait pas partie. » {n}Il laisse échapper un rire dépité, puis recule et porte votre main à ses lèvres.{/n} « J'espère quand même que nous aurons bientôt l'occasion de passer du temps ensemble. En tête à tête. »

languages.text: {n}Wenige Minuten später seufzt Heinrix.{/n} "Ich sollte gehen. Ihr habt einen Berg an Aufgaben und meine Fragen zu beantworten gehört nicht dazu." {n}Er lacht humorlos, tritt einen Schritt zurück und führt deine Hand zu seinen Lippen.{/n} "Ich hoffe dennoch, dass wir die Möglichkeit dazu bekommen, Zeit miteinander zu verbringen. Allein."
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Wenige Minuten später seufzt Heinrix.{/n} "Ich sollte gehen. Ihr habt einen Berg an Aufgaben und meine Fragen zu beantworten gehört nicht dazu." {n}Er lacht humorlos, tritt einen Schritt zurück und führt deine Hand zu seinen Lippen.{/n} "Ich hoffe dennoch, dass wir die Möglichkeit dazu bekommen, Zeit miteinander zu verbringen. Allein."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir süre sonra iç çekiyor.{/n} "Gitmem gerek. Yapman gereken bir dünya işin var ve sorularıma cevap vermek, bu işlerden biri değil." {n}Keyiften yoksun bir hâlde gülerek geri çekiliyor ve elini dudaklarına götürüyor.{/n} "Yine de hâlâ birlikte biraz zaman geçirebileceğimizi umuyorum. Baş başa..."
languages.original_text: {n}A few minutes later, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "I should go. You have a mountain of things to do, and answering my questions isn't one of them." {n}He laughs without humour, steps back, and brings your hand to his lips.{/n} "Still, I hope we will have the chance to spend some time together. Alone."
